alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:29PM CDT until March 26 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 329 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Columbia, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Liddieville around 335 PM CDT. Buckner around 340 PM CDT. Alto around 345 PM CDT. Mangham and Archibald around 350 PM CDT. Holly Ridge around 405 PM CDT. Bakers around 410 PM CDT. Delhi around 415 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Baskin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
